pages.text: Cleavers are the minotaurian underlings of the Gluttonous Bull-King Moloch. Much like the Great Minotaur, Cleavers patrol the maze-like hallways of nether fortresses, looking for fresh meat and lost souls to feast on. They carry with them a massive blade used to butcher any living creature they come across.

On top their butcher-blade, they may use their horns to gore prey, and their vicious teeth to shred flesh. Cleavers have an undying rivalry with Bafometyrs, as both Lesser Demons compete over control of the fortress ruins.
